Title: Establishes the "farmworkers' fair labor practices act"
Summary: Establishes the "farmworkers' fair labor practices act" which allows certain farm laborers to take a minimum of one day of rest per week and prohibits farm employers from requiring their laborers to work more than ten hours in any day, sixty hours in any week or six consecutive days in any week, except in certain circumstances.
LawCode: Amd §§2, 161, 564 & 674, add §163-a, Lab L; amd §201, Work Comp L
ActClause: AN ACT establishing the "farmworkers' fair labor practices act"; to amend the labor law, in relation to allowing farm workers one day of rest each week, and including farm laborers within the provisions pertaining to overtime compensation and unemployment insurance; and to amend the workers' compensation law, in relation to service as farm laborers
